department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Gavin Lew has over 15 years of experience in corporate and academic environments. He has a strong foundation in user-centered design and evaluation. Gavin founded User Centric over 12 years ago. He holds particular interest in mobile technology, healthcare, and global research projects. Prior to co-founding User Centric, Gavin was president of an internet start-up, principal at a web development company, a member of Ameritech's Human Factors group, and Director at another user experience research consulting firm. He is a frequent presenter at national and international conferences. He has over 50 papers and publications and lead inventor on several patents. <p><br><br><br><br>http://www.usercentric.com/about/team
